question: Which among the following is NOT correctly matched?
option1: Confessions of a Secular Fundamentalist – Mani Shankar Aiyar
option2: The Argumentative Indian – A P J Abdul Kalam
option3: An Ordinary Person’s Guide to Empire – Arundhati Roy
answer: The Argumentative Indian – A P J Abdul Kalam
explanation: The author of The Argumentative Indian is Amartya sen
